lines.text: Whatever doesn't kill you makes you stronger, right?
Whatever don't...?
Whatever doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
Whatever don't kill you makes... I like that.
I have an acronym for myself. Know what it is? B.A.D. B.A.D... Balls, Attitude, Direction. You should give yourself an acronym... 'cause it helps you visualize your goals.
How about F.A.B.? Fucked At Birth.
No good. Too negative.
Hey, what's the what?
[at a bar]
See me tomorrow and we'll discuss things.
[goes back to enjoy his drink]
Wait a minute. Why not now?
I haven't been able to find my daughter in a while, and I've already planned the night grieving about it, so you'll just have to see me tomorrow.
No, You see me now.
[takes a tiny gun out]
Tell me now! Go on! I want to hear it.

I ain't going back to jail. I'm tired. They didn't allow me to use silverware. I had to use my fingers. That's right, they didn't even allow me to use plastic spoons, forks, and knives! But I do hate the taste of metal in my mouth. That's why I refused to have braces.

[puts gun on Brown's lip]
Tell me what I want to know, or you'll never have a lip again.
You really going to do it?
No, I got a better idea. You hate the taste of metal. Well, it's going in your mouth. Open up.
[doesn't]
I said open up.
[pulls the trigger back]
Come on, open up and say "ah".
[about his father dying]

[to Kilmartin]
What do you think's worse? Losing a father or a wife?
Don't you know you can't go around hitting the police? Huh? What's wrong with you?

[walking up to Omar's car]
Hey how are you doing?
The fuck do you want man?

[Little Junior kills Omar]
Oh my God! Oh my God! You killed him!

[puts cocaine in Omar's pocket]
Have some coke on me
Jesus! Jesus! What did you do? What did you do? WHAT THE FUCK DID YOU DO?
What did I do? You fuck with the bull, you get the horns. That's what I did
What are you doing? What are you fuckin' doing?
What do you wanna know about the guy for? Huh?
What guy?
Huh?
What fucking guy?

[after being patted down by Junior]
I just did 3 years for...
[pats Jimmy again]
I did 3 years for you, you paranoid motherfucker. Full time, not a day less. For you!
What do you wanna know about the guy for?
J.J. pointed him out to me like 2 minutes before you sat down. If he's got a big fuckin' mouth, take it up with him. I was trying to make a conversation.

[gives Jimmy as quick hug]
It's been a hard week. I'm sorry. You wanna go for a ride? Let's go for a ride
Okay.
What the fuck? You guys look like the Gorton's fishermen
Ronnie, I want you to listen to this.
The time has come for everyone to clean out their own backyard.
Did you ever read about yourself in the paper, huh? Your balls shrivel to the size of chickpeas.
You know what your problem is? You're a liberal.

You see this eye here? Runs all the time. I can't make it stop. I got a third of my hearing in this ear. And when I go to the beach... when I take my kids to the beach and shit, strong direct sunrays give me a headache so bad I cry like a baby. They don't know why. It just does.

[about Omar]
Cars, Drugs, Guns, he's buying whatever he can get his hands on.

[to a FBI agent]
You're not doing shit, because I'll go to the US attorney's office and once they find out t that he was a federal agent that you knew about from day 1? Holy shit what happens to you!
